data.title: Can I label my Wise card?
data.meta_description: You can add a label to your Wise cards. This will make it easier to find the one you want to use, and to distinguish them from each other.  You can do this o...
data.text:
You can add a label to your Wise cards. This will make it easier to find the one you want to use, and to distinguish them from each other.

You can do this on the app or web for both personal and business accounts.

Go to Card

Select the card you’d like to label — on a touchscreen, swipe to your chosen card

Select Card label under the Manage card section

Type in a name or label and Save

The label can be up to 20 characters, including spaces. You can also use emojis.

How do I edit or remove a label?

To edit a label, simply follow the same steps.

To remove a label, just delete the name, and save without adding any characters.
